title: 2BD/2BA Rental - 3rd Flr
posting_body: ['First Group Showing: Sat, August 6th from 10AM-12PM.', 'DESIRABLE LOCATION!', 'Available Sept 1st.', "Don't miss out on this modern 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit located in the historic St. Marks parish neighborhood.", 'This unit is ideally situated for in-town and suburban commutes with a balanced blend of residential life and city amenities.', 'Situated on a one way street across from Hemenway Park, the home is just a short walk to Shawmut & Ashmont T-station, access to I-93.', 'Enjoy a nice leisure walk to Adams Village and/or Peabody Square surrounded by various shops, restaurants and other area amenities.', 'Take a bike ride along the Boston Harborwalk to Castle Island, Carson Beach is just 2.5 miles away or a stroll thru Pope John Paul Park.', 'Unit features master bedroom w/stand-up shower, central heat/AC, EIK with SS appliances, hardwood floors throughout and in-unit washer/dryer.', 'Unit is located on the 3rd floor in a well maintained 3 family owner-occupied residence.', '  https://youtu.be/eznb8--xH2I', 'Disclosures: Pictures/video from previous renter.', 'Use the following link to apply now: <URL>', ' Credit report required to apply.', '$10.00 will be charged to the applicant.']
